name: Clash With The Cursed
description:
Powerups:

Press R to try and get a random of 6 powerups, All powerups last 60 seconds.

  1. Doubles the amount of enemies on the field
  2. You are able to jump higher
  3. You will die in 1 hit
  4. You are granted invincibility
  5. You can run faster
  6. Kill an enemy in every 15 seconds or you die

This list is in the order of powerups present in the game bar.

STORY: 

You got in a car accident and then woke up at a weird place, when you heard the voice of the angel of death, sending his golem army to take you into the hell. 

Objective:

Kill 100 of reaper's golems to escape from hell

How To Play:
  • Move Mouse To Look Around
  • Left click to shoot
  • Try To Shoot The Golems
  • Press R to try and get a random of 6 powerups
  • Golems drop guns on being killed, try to collect as many guns as you can
  • The Right Hand Corner Shows The Amount Of Golems You Have Killed So Far
  • The Left Hand Corner Shows Your HP, and Bullets
